trends: There have been 2 other sightings in New Berlin
There were no other sightings in New Berlin on or around September 17th 2011
divs: sighting detailswife came home from shopping and noticed 4 bright red\orange lights in sky in close formation. pulled into driveway and watched for awhile. called me to come outside. when i got there, there were 2 ufos. one was v shaped with 4 red\orange lights, other object was single red\orange light. the v shaped one's 4 lights then shifted and moved and became 1 red light. before it did this it was stationary and hovered. rather large, quite spectacular really. they eventually flew off beyond sight. i did grab a flashlight and beamed one but nothing became of it.
